amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for acquisition of land by the Federal government except lands located within exterior boundaries designated before the date of enactment.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 106-612 to prohibit amounts available in the bill from being used for acquisition of land by the Federal government except lands located within exterior boundaries desigated before the date of enactment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Peterson (PA) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 108 - 310 (Roll no. 166).
